DOC.brief_summary: This study test whether treatment erlotinib plus SU011248 good erlotinib alone patient advanced/metastatic lung cancer receive previous treatment platinum-based regimen .
DOC.brief_title: A Study In Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer To Test If Erlotinib Plus SU011248 Is Better Than Erlotinib Alone
DOC.criteria: Patients locally advanced/metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer Prior treatment 2 chemotherapy regimen include platinumbased regimen Prior treatment receptor tyrosine kinase inhibitor , VEGF inhibitor ( exception bevacizumab ) angiogenesis inhibitor History know brain metastasis
